plugin-info.description: Crowd Password Encoders shipped with Crowd

encoder.name: MD5 Password Encoder
encoder.description: LDAP based MD5 encoder that pre-appends {MD5} to the password string

encoder.name: A DES Password Encoder
encoder.description: A password encoder based on thr DES encryption algorithm, please note that this is a two-way algorithm

encoder.name: A SSHA Password Encoder
encoder.description: A password encoder that uses a SSHA algorithm

encoder.name: A SHA Password Encoder
encoder.description: A password encoder that uses a SSHA algorithm

encoder.name: A Plaintext Encoder
encoder.description: A password encoder that is simply plaintext, meaning no encryption occurs

encoder.name: Atlassian Security Password Encoder
encoder.description: This password encoder is based on the Atlassian Security Password Encoder and is also backwards compatible with validating atlassian-sha1 hashes.
